# Bowen

AI-Powered Relationship Synthesis and Self-Discovery Workspace.

## Description
Bowen is a visual workspace for mapping relationship dynamics, identifying generational patterns, and generating deep-dive psychological reports using clinical frameworks like Attachment Theory and Family Systems.

## Core Features
- Relationship Graph: A visual canvas for mapping connections.
- Contextual AI: An empathetic assistant with persistent memory of your relationship dynamics.
- Reflection Cards: Daily prompts for uncovering blind spots and shadow work.
- Psychological Reports: Synthesis of your data through established therapeutic frameworks.

## Technical Stack
- Framework: Next.js (React)
- Styling: Tailwind CSS
- State Management: Zustand
- Visualization: React Flow
- Database: MongoDB
- Authentication: Clerk
- LLMs: Claude Sonnet 4.6 / Gemini 1.5 Pro
